meanings.definition: The soft, fatty substance found inside the bones of animals.
meanings.sent1: The chef used marrowbones to make a rich broth.
meanings.sent2: The dog gnawed on the marrowbones to get to the tasty marrow inside.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with the marrowbones, pretending they were treasure.
meanings.sent4: The marrowbones of the story revealed the hidden truth.
meanings.sent5: The butcher displayed the marrowbones, glistening in the light.

meanings.definition: The innermost, essential part of something.
meanings.sent1: Laughter is the marrowbones of happiness.
meanings.sent2: The love shared between friends is the marrowbones of their bond.
meanings.sent3: The melody of the song was the marrowbones of its beauty.
meanings.sent4: Trust forms the marrowbones of a strong relationship.
meanings.sent5: Hope is the marrowbones that keep us going during tough times.
